## RCrawler

```{r RCrawler}
library(httr)

url <- "https://api.courtsite.my/search?address=Petaling%20Jaya,%20Selangor,%20Malaysia"
res = GET(url)
res_json = content(res)
raw = (data.frame(do.call(rbind,res_json$prods)))
```

## Show Results

```{r Table}
library(knitr)
kable(raw)
```
